disclaimer.begin: Disclaimer: I am not a certified architect. The following is for informational purposes only and should be verified by a professional.
disclaimer.end: Always consult with local building regulations and certified professionals before proceeding.

rooms.description: Spacious living area with modern decor, integrating indoor/outdoor flow towards the garden. Large windows ensure ample natural light.
Modern dining space adjacent to the kitchen and open plan layout.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with smart appliances and a breakfast nook adjoining it.
Modern bathroom on ground floor for guests and utility purposes.
Primary bedroom with a private balcony facing east (Vastu compliant), ensuring peaceful mornings.
Secondary bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden, offering serene views.
Additional bedroom with an integrated balcony on the west side for late afternoon light.
Multipurpose guest room that can also serve as a home office or study area.

openings.description: Large entrance door with glass facade to enhance natural light and provide an inviting first impression.
Direct access from the living area into a large garden space, designed for relaxation and outdoor activities.
A dedicated opening leading to a private gym on the ground floor, equipped with modern fitness equipment.
